CustomField.description: The business number is a 9-digit number assigned to a corporation by the Canada Revenue Agency. It is often required to collect GST/HST or to make payroll deductions when paying employees.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The business number is a 9-digit number assigned to a corporation by the Canada Revenue Agency. It is often required to collect GST/HST or to make payroll deductions when paying employees.
CustomField.label: Business Number
